title: Data Engineer - Data Team
description:
The Data team empowers and inspires iChoosr colleagues to make data-driven decisions, in order to actively drive company growth. We don’t operate based on gut feeling, but embed all key decisions in data.



The Data Team is pivotal to all of iChoosr’s teams, be it the Product teams, Marketing, Project Managers, or Customer Service, and to that end, Data Specialists have a crucial role to play. We are always searching for ways to improve business understanding and support stakeholders with actionable insights.



Over the years the Data Team and its role have expanded. We have arrived at a moment where engineering capacity is becoming ever more important. Whether it’s coming up with sustainable and scalable solutions for our data models or building new ETL pipelines, there’s ample space to make a big impact.


**Responsibilities include:**
-----------------------------


* Designing and implementing data pipelines for processing large amounts of structured and unstructured data in our Azure environment.
* Collaborate with software developers and business stakeholders to understand data requirements and develop solutions to meet those needs.
* Help building and maintaining our google cloud platform data warehouse.
* Ensure data quality, accuracy, and reliability through testing and validation.
* Develop and maintain data governance policies and procedures.
* Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or a related field.
* 3+ years of experience in data engineering or a related field.
* Strong programming skills in Python, R, Microsoft SQL. Knowledge of Spark and PySpark is a plus as well.
* Experienced in data warehousing and data modelling.
* Experienced in cloud-based data platforms, such as Azure Synapse or Google Big Query.
* Familiar with ETL tools such as Azure Data Factory.
* Familiar with data governance and data quality best practices.
* Familiar with agile way of working.
* Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
* You’re fluent in English, both written and spoken. Additional languages such as Dutch are a big plus.

title: Computational Physics Engineer - TMC (Eindhoven)
description:
Netherlands Physics Eindhoven Hybrid
We are seeking a knowledgeable and ambitious colleague with a strong technical background to join our team in the field of computational physics. You will be supporting us on a specialized project.

  


About The Member Company
We are a global high-tech consultancy company with a team of entrepreneurial engineers, scientists, and digital experts from around the world. Together we form a fast-growing and proud community. We offer consultancy services to high-profile clients globally in diverse service areas, such as:


* Technology & Engineering
* Energy & Renewables
* Life sciences & Pharma
* Digital & IT
**About this vacancy**
----------------------


· Develop computational models and algorithms to simulate physical systems and phenomena, utilizing techniques such as numerical methods, Monte Carlo simulations, and finite element analysis.· Analyse experimental and observational data using statistical methods, signal processing techniques, and data visualization tools to extract meaningful insights and validate theoretical predictions.· Develop predictive models to forecast the behaviour of complex physical systems under different conditions, providing valuable insights for decision-making and future planning.· Optimize computational algorithms and codes for efficiency, scalability, and accuracy, leveraging parallel computing, GPU acceleration, and high-performance computing (HPC) techniques.· Collaborate with interdisciplinary teams, including physicists, engineers, mathematicians, and domain experts, to integrate computational physics solutions into multidisciplinary research projects and product development efforts.· Develop and maintain computational codes, libraries, and software tools, ensuring code quality, reliability, and documentation standards are met to facilitate reproducibility and collaboration.· Stay abreast of the latest advancements in computational physics, contributing to research publications, patents, and grant proposals. Drive innovation by proposing and implementing novel computational techniques and methodologies.


**What we expect from you**
---------------------------


· Ph.D. in Physics, Computational Physics, or a related field.· Strong background in theoretical and computational physics, with expertise in numerical methods, simulation techniques, and programming languages such as Python, MATLAB, or C++.· Proficiency in scientific computing libraries and tools (e.g., NumPy, SciPy, TensorFlow).· Experience with high-performance computing (HPC) environments and parallel computing techniques.· Excellent problem-solving skills, analytical thinking, and attention to detail.· Effective communication skills and ability to work collaboratively in a team environment.


**What you can expect from us**
-------------------------------


TMC is an international high-tech consultancy company that brings expertise to their clients in order to support them with the realization of their technological challenges. As such, TMC is operating as an expert center at the disposition of its clients and we help them to be more competitive in an ever more global and faster changing technological world. At TMC we believe that people are the driving force behind technological innovation. That is why we want to create the best possible conditions for tech talents to thrive in. We offer you a challenging and stimulating work environment in which you can be the director of your own career. As an Employeneur you are part of our TMC family. Next to our outstanding technical expertise, fun and engagement are meaningful parts of our culture.


The 5 basic principles of **employeneurship**
A long-term working relationship
Enjoy the security of a long-term contract and a stable source of income while getting the opportunity to work at diverse projects.


Individual profit sharing
Full transparency. That’s it. For each of your projects, you know your hourly rate, your costs, and your individual performance-based profit sharing, all in order to stimulate your inner entrepreneur.


Business cells
Our employeneurs are grouped in business cells based on their technical expertise. They are small, focused and function as high-grade knowledge networks. And as buzzing communities of close colleagues.


YOUniversity
Every employeneur drives their own career. Together, we make a plan for personal and professional growth. Receive personal coaching and an extensive training budget to keep developing yourself and deliver outperformance at our clients.

  

The Entrepreneurial Lab
Work on your technical dreams in our lab. Collaborate with others in multidisciplinary teams to unlock out-of-the-box thinking and innovative ideas as well as entrepreneurial skills.
company_description: At TMC we believe it's people who drive technology. Our Employeneurship model creates the best conditions for technical talents to do so.

title: Data Analyst
description:
Bynder goes far beyond managing digital assets. Our digital asset management platform enables teams to conquer the chaos of proliferating content, touchpoints, and relationships in order to thrive.

  



With powerful and intuitive solutions that embrace the way people want to work, and a richly integrated ecosystem, We are the brand ally that unifies and transforms the creation and sharing of assets, inspiring teams, delighting customers, and elevating businesses.

  



Our 500+ employees, known as 'Byndies', together constitute the world's most extensive pool of digital asset management expertise. We enable more than 1.7M users across more than 3,700 organizations, including Spotify, Puma, Five Guys and Icelandair.

  

Founded in 2013, we have eight offices around the globe, including the Netherlands, USA, Spain, UK, Australia and UAE. For more information, visit www.bynder.com.


Bynder's Internal Analytics platform is essential for streamlining our product and business growth by providing best-in-class data and insights to our stakeholders precisely when they need it. We are looking for a skilled **Data Analyst** who will contribute to the technical and analytical efforts of our team, ensuring data-driven decisions and solutions.


### **Responsibilities**


**Data Analysis:** Conduct thorough data analysis to extract meaningful insights, identify trends, and support decision-making processes across the organization.


**Product Analytics**: Conduct in-depth product analytics to identify key trends, user behaviors, and areas for improvement. Collaborate with product teams to drive data-informed decisions and enhance overall product performance.


**Report Generation:** Develop and maintain reports, dashboards, and visualizations using tools like DBT, Snowflake, and ThoughtSpot to provide stakeholders with actionable insights.


**Collaboration:** Work closely with internal stakeholders to understand their data needs and provide solutions that drive business value. Collaborate with other teams in Bynder's Data Group to ensure data consistency and accuracy.


**Technical Contribution:** Utilize your technical skills to manage and manipulate large datasets, ensuring data quality and integrity. Stay updated with the latest industry trends and tools to continuously improve our data practices.


### **Qualifications**


**Experience**: Minimum of 3 years in data analytics, with hands-on experience in analyzing and interpreting complex data sets.


**Technical Skills**: Proficiency in SQL and Python is essential. Experience in DBT, data warehouses (e.g. Snowflake) or machine learning is a plus.


**Communication**: Strong communication skills to effectively convey insights and collaborate with team members and stakeholders.


**Collaboration:** Demonstrated ability to work with internal stakeholders and engineers to deliver exceptional outputs.



Join us to leverage your analytical expertise to drive Bynder's growth through data and analytics. If you have a passion for data and an aptitude for technical problem-solving, we want to hear from you!

  


### **Why you'll love Bynder!**



At Bynder, innovation is in our DNA. We've worked hard to build an environment that promotes creative thinking and self-initiative within a culture of fun. It's common to find colleagues hanging out after work - if you believe in "be nice, work hard, have fun", you'll have an office full of friends.


### **What we have:**


* Challenging and inspiring work environment
* Flat hierarchy where your voice will be truly heard
* Opportunity to initiate your own projects
* An experienced team is ready to welcome you anytime
* Unlimited vacation policy
* Competitive monthly compensation
* Apple gear
* Daily lunch
* Drinks at the Bynder Bar :-)
* Amazing office in the heart of Amsterdam

### **Our Commitment:**



Bynder Love is the principle that guides the way we grow our teams, support our employees, and celebrate our differences. At Bynder we strive to create a culture that embraces every Byndie because differences in background, experience, and perspective make Bynder even better. At Bynder a diverse, inclusive, and equitable workplace is one where all employees, whatever their ethnicity, color, sex, age, religion, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, or physical and mental ability are valued and respected. Our commitment is for all Byndies to have the freedom to be their true authentic selves.



Just as we are never finished innovating, Bynder's commitment to being An Even Better Bynder is a constant, evolving commitment that includes education, listening, and action.



#LI-Hybrid

title: Senior BI Specialist
description:
(Sr.) Professional Job Netherlands, Delft Corporate Functions Netherlands
As a Senior BI Specialist, you participate and provide input for data integration, transformation of multiple data source systems, develop data warehouses with a combination of business intelligence, data visualization and reporting tools. Next to this, you advocate self-service analytics and will give training sessions to empower the business to build their own reports, dash boards and power BI models. At Exact, your technical skills and “dare to” mentality, can lead to the best innovations. And where is your career heading? That’s up to you. The career opportunities are unprecedented. 2000 enterprising colleagues have already paved the way. Are you on board?

 **This = the job you are looking for:**

* Provide expert guidance on Business Intelligence (BI) skills and technologies.
* Develop scalable and maintainable BI applications to meet business objectives.
* Develop security and authentication standards for the department.
* Maintain accurate and complete technical architectural documents.
* Define BI standards, guidelines and best practices for business groups and technical teams.
* Support BI tools upgrades in development, testing and documentation.
* Perform maintenance and troubleshooting activities for BI tools.
* Diagnose and resolve BI tool capacity issues.
* Recommend strategies to improve performance and capacity of BI tools.
* Address customer queries and issues in a timely manner.
* Provide technical training on BI tools to team members.
* Collaborate with BI Administrators, Developers and Analysts for successful development of BI reporting and analysis solutions.
* Work with business groups and technical teams to develop and maintain data warehouse platform for BI reporting.
* Design and build tabular models writing complex DAX formulae.
* Build scalable data warehouse solutions using PaaS and SaaS services in Microsoft cloud.
* Address master data issues and provide data solutions to manage them.


You will join the 6 colleagues in the Corporate BI department. They are known for their great technical knowledge and smooth cooperation. Asking for help if necessary and offering help if possible is part of their DNA. We have few predefined paths, which gives you plenty of room to choose your own.

**The main responsibilities of the department are:**

* Key operations of the business intelligence team begin with the design and deployment of the BI architecture, which includes source systems, data warehouses, and a combination of business intelligence, data visualization, and reporting tools.
* Advocate self-service analytics and train to empower Business to build their own reports, dash boards and power BI models.
* Agree to SLA’s for providing front line support to the business users on the BI cubes and deliver big fixes and enhancements on a timely basis.


**This = what you bring**


With us, you can be yourself, and we would love to discover what sets you apart. For the position of Senior BI Specialist, it’s helpful if you have analytical skills and that you have good communications skills. What’s more, you bring:

* Microsoft suite of BI tools (Both On-premises and Cloud)
* Relevant experience in building data warehouse solutions in cloud using PaaS and SaaS services.
* Around 10 or more years of experience
* Reporting tools, mainly Power BI
* Data modeling, data warehousing, data visualization & analytics
* Programming languages like Python, .net, R would be added value.

**This = what you get**


At Exact we value the balance between work and relaxation. You can work up a sweat in our own gym or take a break at the coffee bar. Empty your head and then tackle your daily tasks with renewed energy. And, of course, that's not all. As a Senior BI Specialist, based on 40 hours per week, you can also count on:

* A competitive salary package incl. a 13th month and of course 8% holiday allowance
* An international, innovative and hybrid working environment, with the flexibility to work from home or any of our offices
* Over 2000 colleagues worldwide of which more than 500 in technology.
* 27 vacation days and in addition, loyalty days; one for each year in service with a max of 5
* 3 Giving back days, which can spend on giving back to (local) community
* A modern pension scheme
* All the room your ambition needs and to further develop your skills we facilitate training via our learning and development center to help you to fulfill your career potential
* Friday afternoon drinks at our bar “Bits & Bytes”

**About Exact**


Exact develops cloud software for small and medium-sized companies and their accountants. The products automate business processes in areas such as Finance and HR and provide specific ERP solutions for wholesale distribution, manufacturing, projects and construction. This saves time and provides insight. It enables customers to work efficiently, make informed decisions and continue growing. More than 675,000 companies primarily in the Netherlands, Belgium and Germany already rely on Exact's software.


Exact was founded in 1984 in Delft, the Netherlands, which is still the location of our head office. Every day, more than 2,000 ambitious professionals work on innovation. Driving responsible business, with respect for each other, the environment and society is central to this. For more information, visit www.exact.com.


  
##### **Vragen?**


Contact Arthur Fransen  

  



+31 15 711 5000

title: Data Specialist
description:
**Data Specialist**


Your expertise truly drives the solutions that sustain our business and the products that serve our customers. Our Data Specialists have to stand out from the rest. We need Data professionals who constantly drive the focus on managed data solutions.

**You and your Job**


As a Data Specialist within the Customer Insights team, you will play a crucial role in analysing and interpreting data to provide valuable insights for our business. You will be using your analytical expertise to translate data into powerful models and actionable insights with the aim to better understand our customers and improve our products and services. You are a strong communicator able to advise product, development and sales teams with your data driven stories. If you have a relevant bachelor’s degree (preferably a master’s degree), strong analytical abilities, and a passion for programming and data analysis, we encourage you to apply.

**Practical Examples**

* Investigate business information needs and define functionalities for new tools and models.
* Develop and maintain analytics solutions for data processing and visualization.
* Create models and algorithms that continuously recognize, signal, and report patterns in data.
* Independently collect, edit, validate, and understand collected data for predictive insights.
* Contribute to process improvements and operational design.
* Act as a sparring partner, providing expertise and advice to colleagues and management.

**Facts & Figures**

* 36 hours per week
* Part of Business Banking with colleagues from a wide range of backgrounds and countries
* 43,822 Rabobank colleagues around the world

**Top 6 Responsibilities**

* Understanding Business Needs: Collaborate with business stakeholders to understand their information requirements and formulate specific questions that drive data analysis.
* Make Business Impact: Make suggestions for business/process improvements based on the findings/insights from the analysis and data.
* Data Transformation and Insights: Develop user-friendly solutions that transform large datasets into actionable insights based on predefined specifications.
* Data Collection and Validation: Gather, process, validate, and analyze data to extract predictive insights.
* Effective Communication: Advise decision-makers and ensure satisfaction among internal and external stakeholders.
* Monitoring and Coordination: Efficiently monitor, coordinate, and adjust activities to achieve desired results aligned with organizational goals.

**Together we achieve more then alone**


We believe in the power of difference. Bringing together people's differences is what makes us an even better bank. So we are very curious about what you can bring to our team at Commercial Products and Services.


‘Being part of the bigger Business Banking team creates a lot of opportunity to collaborate with colleagues which creates excitement in our B2B Sales team and also brings us together as part of the Commercial Products and Services team.’


Alet Nel, Customer Insights Specialist


Customer Insights is part of Customer Engagement within B2B Sales that is part of Commercial Products and Services within Business Banking that is part of Retail Netherlands. Our main focus areas are the improvement of customer satisfaction and journeys; existing customer management; and identifying additional revenue opportunities. Working together is the way we work; as 1 team at Rabobank. Talking of Rabobank: We are a Dutch bank that operates in 38 countries for over 9,5000,000 customers. Together with these customers, our members and partners we stand side by side to create a world in which everyone has access to enough healthy food. In the Netherlands we work to create a country in which people are happy with how they live, work and do business.

**You and your talent**


The work you do will impact your team and your internal and external stakeholders, but also the client servicing process and therefore the bank’s core business. This impacts the way Rabobank actively serves its clients.


In addition to that, you:

* Hold a Bachelor’s degree (preferably master’s) in a relevant field.
* Strong analytical skills.
* Affinity for programming, data, and analysis (e.g., SQL, Python)
* Experience with visualization tools (e.g., PowerBI).
* Excellent presentation skills.
* Ability to work independently and collaboratively.
* Proficiency in both English and Dutch.


If you meet these qualifications and are passionate about data, we encourage you to apply. Join our dynamic team and make a meaningful impact!

**This is what we offer yo**

* Gross salary between € 3.711 and € 5.300 per month (scale 8). Depending on your experience and seniority.
* A thirteenth month and holiday pay;
* An Employee Benefit Budget, 10 % of your monthly salary. You decide how to spend this budget. This may include purchasing extra leave days, making extra pension contributions or even receiving a monthly cash payout;
* A compensation for your commute if you travel by public transport, bicycle or car;
* A pension scheme, to which you have the choice to contribute 3.5% or 5.5%;
* Hybrid working;
* A personal development budget of €1400.

 **You and the job application process**  



Are you ready to join Rabobank as a Data Specialist and to make a difference to yourself, our customers and to society? We look forward to receiving your application for this vacancy in Utrecht.

* Any questions about the job content? Contact: Alet Nel, Customer Insights Specialist via alet.nel@rabobank.nl.
* Any questions about working at Rabobank and the process? Lex Verwayen, Corporate Recruiter via lex.verwayen@rabobank.nl.
* Your privacy is important to us. If you would like to find out more about this, please click on this link.
* A security check is part of the process.
* You can find answers to the most frequently asked questions on rabobank.jobs/en/faq.
* Everyone is different, and it is exactly those differences that help us become an even better bank. That's why we want to know who you really are!


#LI-LV5 #rabobank #data #insights

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description:
Beyond Sports is an AI-based visualization company that offers a new way of experiencing sports. Our unique visualization platform enables next level real-time sports engagement solutions for leagues, broadcasters, brands and ultimately the consumers, allowing for never seen before sports content. We push the boundaries of sports content creation together with industry giants like NHL, NFL, FIFA, Disney, and many more.

**Job Description**


Our Machine Learning team is looking to expand in the direction of motion synthesis and 3D graphics. We are searching for a candidate who is passionate about applying cutting-edge technologies to data-driven virtual environments. We offer a vibrant office and a diverse team to collaborate on a variety of projects.


As a Machine Learning Engineer, you will contribute to the development of tools that enhance the creative workflow of our artists and systems that make our virtual characters follow the live tracking data of a sports match. Part of your work will include the development of generative models, ML-based data augmentation and the validation of limb tracking systems. After prototyping, the models are deployed as cloud-hosted APIs. While the models are developed in Python, you will sometimes use Unity to collect data or validate the output.

**Responsibilities**

* Implement and maintain robust systems to facilitate the automated analysis of sports data, ensuring accuracy and efficiency.
* Research and prototype advanced ML models for trajectory prediction, motion synthesis, and 2D to 3D geometry pipelines (e.g., Transformers, GNNs, Diffusion).
* Develop and deploy your machine learning models as cloud-hosted APIs to enable seamless integration and accessibility across the organization.
* Collaborate with team members to keep our codebases clean, scalable, and maintainable.
* Stay up to date on the latest research and identify opportunities for new systems at Beyond Sports.
* Review your teammates code and give constructive feedback.

**Qualifications**

* MSc degree in Computer Science, Computer Graphics, Artificial Intelligence, or equivalent.
* 1-3 years of professional experience in the field of Machine Learning or Data Science.
* Experience with developing state-of-the-art models in Tensorflow or PyTorch.
* Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English.
* Able to collaborate with people from different backgrounds, like artists and game programmers.
* Able to work in our inspiring office in Alkmaar.

**Nice to have**

* Affinity with mathematical modelling and algorithm development.
* Experience with deploying models in a cloud computing platform, such as AWS or Azure.
* Proficiency with Git and MLOps tools, like MLFlow, for version control and experiment tracking.
* Experience with Unity or another game engine.
* Basic knowledge about football and team sports in general.

**Benefits**


Be part of a productive and dynamic work environment


Personal development planning


Work closely with innovative companies like Sony and Hawk-Eye


25 holidays per annum


Healthy prepared lunch and fresh fruits every day


Company gym card

* Friday afternoon bites and drinks

title: Quant Developer, Private Equity
description:
**APG Asset Management, with offices in Netherlands, New York, and Hong Kong, is seeking a talented Quant Developer to join our dynamic Global Private Equity team comprising 47 Full-Time Equivalents (FTE). This role, reporting to the global co-heads of private equity, is integral to advancing our digitalization vision.**
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Locatie
Amsterdam
Dienstverband
32-40 uur
Jaren ervaring
8+ jaar werkervaring
Opleidingsniveau
Master / WO
Publicatiedatum
2 juli 2024
  
### **Dit wordt je functie**

  

**Functieomschrijving**

**Job description:**  

As a Quant Developer, you will play a pivotal role in shaping and executing our data & analytics strategy, leveraging and optimizing our existing data architecture. Key responsibilities include streamlining data ingestion, integrating relevant (big) data sources, collaborating with the business on decision-making, analyzing complex datasets, developing machine learning models, and providing actionable insights to drive strategic business decisions.  

This position is ideal for candidates with a strong quantitative background, offering an exciting opportunity to contribute to our business growth.

 **Dit ga je doen**

**Main Duties and Responsibilities:**

* Contribute to the development of the digitalization vision within Private Equity.
* Enhance data pipelines, visualizations (graphs), and analytical tools for increased professionalism.
* Conduct thematic research with a quantitative focus on pertinent topics to evaluate the impact on the investment portfolio.
* Transform research findings into robust analytics with minimal maintenance requirements.

 **Dit breng je mee**

**Job Requirements:**

* Master’s degree or higher with high distinction in quantitative methods, mathematics, or a related statistical/data-oriented field from a top-tier school.
* Relevant experience as a quant developer or quantitative analyst.
* Proficiency in programming languages, particularly Python.
* Experience with SQL and data manipulation libraries (e.g., Pandas, NumPy).
* Familiarity with data visualization tools (e.g., Power BI, Dash).
* Strong problem-solving and communication skills.
* Long-term value creation mindset: broad-minded, innovative, forward-thinking.
* Ability to collaborate effectively with internal and external stakeholders.
* Adaptability and willingness to address a diverse range of demands.
* Profound knowledge of English language.
* Willing to undertake occasional regional travel.

 **Dit bieden wij**

**What APG has to offer**  

We offer you a competitive monthly salary based on 40-hours and attractive terms of employment with a  

focus on flexibility.  

  

* A guaranteed year-end bonus of 8.33%;
* A target driven bonus scheme;
* Ample attention to your vitality and personal development;
* Ability to grow your professional network, internally as well as externally;
* Working from home for 2 to 3 days, and also working from one of our beautiful offices;
* And of course a well-organized pension.

  

For pension provider APG, pensions are about people, life and how we live together. Through careful asset  

management, pension administration, communication and advice, APG wants to help building a decent  

future in which we share our well-being and prosperity honestly and sustainably. For present and future  

generations. For today, tomorrow and beyond.  

  

APG is committed to serving 4.7 million people in the Netherlands. That explains the importance we attach  

to reflecting Dutch society. To that end, APG strives for an inclusive work environment in which everyone  

can be themselves and their unique qualities are embraced.  

  

Choosing APG means choosing a job in which you contribute to a bright future. Don’t delay, apply today! **Meer informatie**

**More information**  

For more information please feel free to reach out to Carlos Garcia Rivas. You can contact him via the following e-mail address: carlos.garciarivas@apg-am.nl. If you have any other question, please contact our recruiter Roy Tholen, roy.tholen@apg.nl.  

  

A Pre-Employment Screening is part of the procedure.

title: Digital phenotyping data analyst
description:
Solynta is a young seed company that develops and implements hybrid breeding technology in diploid potato. This technology will accelerate the development of innovative potato varieties, with true seed as starting material. We have a position open for a:
  
  

Digital phenotyping data analyst (MSc/PhD)
  
  

For our selections on plants and on tubers we are looking for possibilities to use digital phenotyping methods for improving the data collection. You are a person that determines the best way to phenotype different traits, and that calibrates digital phenotyping data with actual plant measurements. You have experience in image analysis, machine learning and crop modelling. The goal of this position is to develop methods of digital phenotyping to a tool that breeders can use to make selections.
  
  

Key activities / responsibilities
  
Image analysis of plants and plant material
  
Processing of raw data into interpretable information
  
Correlation of digital phenotyping data to plant traits
  
Develop new digital phenotyping methods
  
Close collaboration with breeders, agronomists, scientific software engineers and data engineers
  
Requirements
  
An MSc in biosystems engineering or similar with an applied remote sensing component
  
Proficiency in traditional and deep-learning-based computer vision and image analysis for plant growth measurement
  
Working knowledge of contemporary statistical learning methods and tools
  
Programming skills with expertise in R, Python or other statistical software
  
including traditional statistical analysis and machine learning
  
A good command of geospatial data analysis and visualization methods
  
Experience with digital phenotyping techniques
  
Knowledge of the spectral properties of plants and their relations to plant growth processes
  
Interest to translate science into a usable product
  
Ability to work closely together with diverse people
  
  

**What We Offer:**  

An enthusiastic and growing team with ambition and passion to drive real change
  
The opportunity to join a dedicated team working on ground-breaking innovations for improving the global food supply
  
Home office is situated in Wageningen
  
Opportunities for growth and development within a dynamic organization
  
  

**Application:**  

To join our team as a Digital phenotyping data analyst please submit the form below including:
  
  

A short motivation why this position and working at Solynta both align with your personal goals and ambitions.
  
Your CV
  
  

For inquiries about the application process and the vacancy, please email recruitment@solynta.com.
  
  

If you have any questions about the vacancy, please contact Julia Stockem, tel. 06 51894987. The application deadline is July 31, 2024.
  
  

Acquisition in response to this vacancy is not appreciated and will not be responded to.

title: Senior UX Researcher
description:
#### **Can you help us change the world?**

  


It's true. At Mews, we dream big. As a Hotel Tech unicorn valued at $1.2b, we're propelling new-generation cloud technology within global hospitality. With our industry-leading property management solution**,** we're enabling the world's most revolutionary hospitality brands to accelerate their digital transformation.



We're on the lookout for ambitious, tenacious and passionate people who want to join the next generation of innovators and disrupt the hospitality industry with us. Sound good so far? Keep reading and tumble down the Mews rabbit hole...



‍ #### **About the role**



First things first: you want to know what you're actually applying for. It's impossible to capture every nuance of a role – especially at a rapidly growing company like Mews – but if we had to distil it down to a job description (which we do because this is a job description), it would be this:



We are looking for an experienced Mixed Method Sr. UX Researcher with undeniable passion to drive innovation in the Guest Experience field and can inspire design decisions to take Hospitality solutions to the next level.

  


 **We are looking for:**


**Specialist in Customer Experience research**


* With strong expertise in mixed-method research in the UX research team and help us build international research at Mews. Become an ambassador for UX deep insights and supporter of quantitative and qualitative projects.


**Collaborative mate**


* Alongside with UXR team collaborate closely with other teams and stakeholders to empower their work and help them reach company goals.
* Great communicator that can share insights in a clear, actionable way as well as fostering engagement and drive UXR adoption.


**Contextual master**


* Ability to see the stories in the data and articulate them. The key is to work with multiple sources of data.
* Ability to see the bigger picture (strategic thinking) and being able to zoom-in and zoom-out accordingly in every stage of the research process.


**Innovator and Strategist**


* Passion and hunger for learning new things are essential as well as implementing them and sharing experiences. Love experimenting with methodological approaches and tools to do it.


Extra points for a hospitality knowledge. We all travel, you can expect discussions and tips for your future trips

  


**✅ Your mission, should you choose to accept it:**


* **Quantitative Analysis**: Conduct data-driven analyses to understand customer behaviour, preferences, and pain points. Leverage statistical tools and methodologies to extract insights from large datasets. Proficient in SQL, Python / R, and data visualization software.
* **KPI Measurement**: Define and track key performance indicators (KPIs) related to customer satisfaction, loyalty, and retention.
* **Predictive Modelling**: Develop predictive models to forecast customer behaviour and inform strategic decisions.
* **Data Visualization**: Present findings and recommendations through clear visualizations and reports.
* **Customer Journey Mapping**: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to map out end-to-end customer journeys, identifying touchpoints and pain areas as well as opportunities.
* **Segmentation and Personalization**: Use mixed-method research to segment customer groups and tailor personalized experiences.
* **Stakeholder Management**: Work closely with product managers, UX designers, product marketing and data science teams to align CX strategies with business goals.

  



**️ You'll be a great fit if you bring a few of the below with you:**


* Experience with online research tools (Looker, Gainsight, Useberry, Userinterviews, Dovetail)
* Comprehensive experience as a mixed method Customer Experience Researcher
* Education: Economics, Sociology, Anthropology, Psychology... with a focus on customer experience research, data analysis and visualization.
* Experience with CX strategy and measurement, VoC.
* Experience with Participatory Design and Innovation frameworks.
* Experience with Ethnographic research and other qualitative methods, trend analysis, benchmarking, competitive analysis
* Education: Master's or Ph.D. in a quantitative field (e.g., Sociology, Statistics, Economy, Marketing).
* Experience: Comprehensive experience with mixed method research within a relevant industry (e.g., travel, commodity trading, finance, tech)


**Technical Skills**:


* Proficiency in Python or R (backend and frontend development).
* Familiarity with SQL for data extraction and manipulation.
* Sound statistical skills.
* Experience with data analytics tools.
* Experience with Ethnography and qualitative methods


**Soft Skills**:


* Analytical mindset.
* Innovative problem-solving.
* Strong communication and collaboration abilities.
* Stakeholder management.

  


**What to expect when it comes to hiring:**



The number of rounds and their order is not written in stone, but in most cases, you can expect:



* **Initial interview (** 30min)  

This is the right place to get to know each other, understand motivation & outline expectations.


* **Technical interview + Team-fit (** 60min, typically 20min per case study)  

So let's dive together into your case studies: how you tackle challenges, the design research process, your role, and to understand the outputs and impact you made or lessons learned you took.


* **Final decision**



Sometimes, you can meet more people during the interview process, such as our founder or CPO, within these sessions or as a separate call.

  

###  **What's in it for you?**



Did you know that Mews was voted the Best PMS of 2024 and has previously held the title of Best Place to Work in Hotel Tech for two consecutive years? You do now. Most of that is down to our inspiring team, but part of it is because of some pretty amazing perks. As well as awesome colleagues and stimulating work, you'll get:



* Participation in the Company shares program
* Best-in-class Parental Leave Policy. At Mews, as the primary caregiver you get 6 months of fully paid parental leave, and as a secondary caregiver, you get 2 months of fully paid parental leave.
(No matter your location, this can be used during the 1st year and applies if you've been employed for at least 1 year at Mews)
* Flexible Benefits via the ThanksBen platform
* Unlimited paid holiday (no, this is not a typo)
* Wellness Wednesday's (once a month, the whole company enjoys a day where you can attend to your own well-being)
* Remote/flexible working (we're 100% hybrid-proof, but we cannot hire from anywhere in the world unfortunately, so feel free to reach out and check with us!)
* Monthly working from home allowance and a monthly healthcare insurance allowance (we want you to be happy & healthy)
* Regular team events and socials

 #### **Who is Mews?**



We want to get to know you, so it's only fair we tell you a little bit about ourselves first. Mews has been transforming hospitality since 2012. What began in a single hotel in Prague now powers thousands of hotels around the world, as they pursue their mission to develop transformational solutions for brands and create remarkable experiences for guests.



Since the beginning, Mews embraced being different. Mews is not simply a property management system, but a connected hospitality cloud with products across the hotel ecosystem and more integrations than anyone else.



From global hospitality brands to independent properties, hoteliers join Mews because they recognize the power of innovation. They understand that they can benefit from hotel tech that drives efficiency, maximizes revenue, and improves guest happiness.



Powering over 5,000 customers across more than 85 countries, Mews Hospitality Cloud is designed to streamline operations for modern hoteliers, transform the guest experience and create more profitable businesses.



Ranked 24th in the FT 1000 list of the fastest-growing European companies in 2021, Mews has been recognized as the Best PMS by industry peers at the HotelTechAwards in both 2020 and 2024, consistently earning acclaim. Mews also achieved finalist status in 2021 and 2022. What's more, we take immense pride in being listed among the Best Places to Work in Hotel Tech during those same years and again this year. But our achievements don't stop there; Mews was also listed among the World's Best Hotel PMS Provider 2023 and as the World's Best Independent Hotel PMS Provider 2022 and 2023 by the World Travel Tech Awards.



 #### **Life at Mews**

That's what we do, but what about who we are? Mews' culture is special and difficult to capture in words, which makes writing this tricky. You'll experience the freedom to be yourself and the ability to watch your ideas come to life. You'll have an open line of communication and an open invitation to after-work drinks, be they virtual or in-person. Sometimes the work can be challenging and there can be a lot of it, but you'll always be able to rely on those around you.



Yes, we're ambitious and we move fast, but we know the value of fun and taking a breather. Every month we have a Wellness Wednesday, a day off that you can use to boost your health, whether that's a long lie-in, a trip to the gym, or anything in between. We have slack channels for almost every interest imaginable, and an all-company meeting every Friday gives you the chance to ask any question to our leadership team.



To get more of an idea what life at Mews is like, check out our Instagram .  

  

We're guided by our five key values; if you see yourself in them, it's time to get in touch.

  

#### **Everyone is welcome at Mews**



To reimagine the art of hospitality, we need teams who represent our global and diverse customers and users. Our differences make Mews, so we welcome people of all backgrounds and identities to work with us. Embracing different perspectives, trying new things and feeling safe to bring your authentic self to work. If this sounds like you and you're ready to join a global, innovative, and exciting community, we'd love to hear from you!



One very important note….don't hold back! Even if you think you don't meet 100% of the criteria listed in this job role, we still encourage you to apply. We believe that everyone should have equal access to opportunities and want to ensure we provide an inclusive experience, so do let us know if there is anything else we can do to support your application process. We can't wait to hear from you!

title: Data Analyst III
description:
**Work Schedule**


Standard (Mon-Fri)**Environmental Conditions**


Office**Job Description**

**About us**
============


In our part of Thermo Fisher Scientific we provide innovative solutions for electron microscopy in scientific and industrial lab environments. With these solutions Thermo Fisher Scientific aims to make the world healthier, cleaner and safer.


We are looking for a new member of the global Digital Transformation team based in France, Czech Republic, the Netherlands and the USA. We strive to bring digital technology into our products, solutions and services, enabling connectivity, data extraction and data analysis in order to change the way how we do business and to help science progress through the data!


Are you curious about the potential of data and information to transform how we innovate and make scientific discoveries?

**Responsibilities**
====================


You will develop insights into how our products and services are helping our customers achieve their goals in cooperation with fellow analysts, engineers, product managers and product owners.

### **Typical tasks:**

* Develop analytics (models, metrics, algorithms), prepare data pipelines and model deployments (both for statistical analysis and machine learning) while helping to scale the data infrastructure.
* Help teams identify data analytics and assist in defining intuitive visualizations and prepare, evaluate, extract and qualify data for analysis.
* Communicate on plans and outcomes and document to provide context and understanding of the results.

**Who do we look for**
======================

* A degree in Engineering, Master, PhD in science, mathematics or related subject is required.
* Two years or more of experience in data analytics, data science, and/or statistics.
* The ability to quickly understand a variety of topics and recognize areas where data can provide business value, while bringing a curiosity and self-starter mentality.
* Skills in communication (English), cooperation and critical thinking will help you succeed in your role.
* The ideal candidate enjoys working in a multi-cultural, collaborative high-tech environment

### **Experiences in the following tools are considered a plus:**

* Deep learning frameworks and model platforms: Keras, Tensorflow, Pytorch, Hugging Face.
* Dashboarding visualization: Grafana, PowerBI, Superset.
* Experience in programming languages and tools (e.g. Python, Numpy, Pandas, Scikit-learn, SQL, Plotly, Git, Jira).

**Your benefits**
=================

* Opportunity to join Thermo Fisher Scientific – world leader in serving science, company culture which stands for integrity, intensity, involvement, and innovation.
* Being part of technological breakthroughs of the future.
* Annual bonus.
* Company stocks program.


Thermo Fisher Scientific is an EEO/Affirmative Action Employer and does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, protected veteran status, disability or any other legally protected status.

**Accessibility/Disability Access**
-----------------------------------


We will ensure that individuals with disabilities are provided reasonable accommodation to participate in the job application or interview process, to perform crucial job functions, and to receive other benefits and privileges of employment. Please contact us to request accommodation.
company_description: At Thermo Fisher Scientific, our professionals develop critical solutions—and build rewarding careers.

title: Analytics Engineer
description:
You support your team through your technical expertise and passion for data. Together with your team, you build amazing data products that provide important insights to Coolblue, so everyone can make better and educated business decisions.  

**How do I become a Analytics Engineer at Coolblue?**  

  

You work in a multi-functional team, collaborating with other Analytics Engineers, Data Engineers and Analysts, to provide insights that support strategic decision-making across your domain.  

  

You play a key role in building complex data products by combining and transforming raw data into insights, while applying software engineering best practices in handling analytics code base. You publish and share these products and make them easy to access by keeping an updated data catalog and implementing data governance. Your efforts ensure data consistency, reliability, and accessibility across the organization.  

  

Share your knowledge and passion for data analytics with colleagues. You'll be instrumental in fostering a culture where data-driven decision-making is the norm, not the exception.  

  

You are confident in your skills, in particular in SQL and Data Modeling, and you use all opportunities to coach your colleagues about those topics. Would you also like to become an Analytics Engineer at Coolblue? Read below if the job suits you.  

  

Do you get more excited about diving deep into data pipelines and infrastructure? Explore our Data Platform Engineer vacancy and take the lead in shaping Coolblue's data platform!  

  

**You enjoy doing this**  

* Transforming complex data into meaningful insights by working alongside business teams, understanding their needs, and delivering data-driven insights that help them achieve their goals.
* Organizing data, ensuring it's easily accessible. Your work with data catalogs and governance frameworks ensures that data is reliable, consistent, and readily available for analysis.
* Spreading your knowledge in data analysis, cultivating a data-driven mindset throughout the organization.
* You are always eager to learn new tools and techniques in analytics and business intelligence, keeping Coolblue at the cutting edge of data-driven decision making.

  

  

**You recognize yourself in the following**  

* You have 3+ years of experience working as a data engineer/analytics engineer or data warehouse developer or in a technical data analytics role.
* You have experience with SQL and a programming language, preferably Python.
* You have experience with DBT and hands on experience with cloud environments such as BigQuery, Snowflake or Redshift.
* You have a solid understanding of data warehousing, orchestration, pipeline and visualization solutions.
* You have knowledge about visualization tools such as Looker.
* You have excellent communication skills and the ability to adjust your message to different audiences.

  

  

**This is what you’re looking for in a job**  

* Money.
* Over 30 training courses at our own Coolblue University.
* Travel allowance and a retirement plan.
* 25 leave days. As long as you promise to come back.
* Travel allowance, a pension plan and where-you-work-money.
* A discount on all our products.
* Relocation assistance: from A to Z. We will make sure it goes well and give full support.
* An extraordinarily good work environment with colleagues from all over the world who make you happy, epic Coolblue parties, pubquizzing, and other activities.
* Room for new initiatives and ideas. We’re always open to those, whether you’ve been with us for a week, a month, or a year.
* A job at one of the fastest-growing companies in the Benelux.
* A picture-perfect office at a great location. You could crawl to work from Rotterdam Central Station. Though we recommend just walking for 2 minutes.
* At this moment we have a hybrid way of working: a combo between working from home and at the office. Of course we take care of a home office supplies. Including a desk chair, laptop and blue colored decoration.

title: Marketing Operations Data Intern
description:
Bynder goes far beyond managing digital assets. Our digital asset management platform enables teams to conquer the chaos of proliferating content, touchpoints, and relationships in order to thrive.

  



With powerful and intuitive solutions that embrace the way people want to work, and a richly integrated ecosystem, We are the brand ally that unifies and transforms the creation and sharing of assets, inspiring teams, delighting customers, and elevating businesses.

  



Our 500+ employees, known as 'Byndies', together constitute the world's most extensive pool of digital asset management expertise. We enable more than 1.7M users across more than 3,700 organizations, including Spotify, Puma, Five Guys and Icelandair.

  

Founded in 2013, we have eight offices around the globe, including the Netherlands, USA, Spain, UK, Australia and UAE. For more information, visit www.bynder.com.

**About the role:**



As Marketing Operations Data Intern you will be part of the Bynder Revenue Operations team. Which is responsible for helping the Marketing, Sales and Customer Success teams achieve their goals & targets. Their purpose is to increase efficiency, effectiveness, and business contribution by aligning revenue impacting teams. The team focuses on both strategic and tactical projects relating to Forecasting, Data Analysis, Process Design, Technology, and Data Governance.



As a Data Intern within the Marketing Operations team you will help set up and maintain the marketing data landscape. This involves data documentation, data cleaning & visualization and enabling marketers to use our BI tool for data analysis.


**What you will do:**


* Data Analysis
* Data normalization
* Support marketers with their day-to-day data needs
* Assist with the administration of multiple marketing tools
* Help out with ad-hoc projects to improve marketing processes
* Develop the framework to solve challenges


**What you have:**


* You need to be available for a 6 month long full-time internship from ±August/September 2024.
* You currently follow an education in a related field (Business, Marketing, Data Analytics, etc.)
* You are not afraid to work with numbers
* Advanced knowledge of Microsoft Excel and Word
* Knowledge of a BI tool (Sisense, ThoughtSpot, Tableau or similar) is a plus
* Knowledge of a data programming language (Python, R, Matlab) is a plus
* You need to be fluent in English
* You need to be enrolled in a school/university throughout the whole duration of the internship


**Nice to haves:**


* You have a self starter mentality
* You need to have top-notch communication skills in speaking and in writing
* You have a strategic mindset, and you're eager to learn


**Why you'll love Bynder!**



At Bynder, innovation is in our DNA. We've worked hard to build an environment that promotes creative thinking and self-initiative within a culture of fun. It's common to find colleagues hanging out after work - if you believe in "be nice, work hard, have fun", you'll have an office full of friends.


**What we offer:**


* Work experience on a global level
* Paid internship
* The chance to be part of a young and ambitious team
* On-the-job training
* Personal development
* A broad scope of responsibilities
* Free lunch available every day


**Our commitment:**



Bynder Love is the principle that guides the way we grow our teams, support our employees, and celebrate our differences. At Bynder we strive to create a culture that embraces every Byndie because differences in background, experience, and perspective make Bynder even better. At Bynder a diverse, inclusive, and equitable workplace is one where all employees, whatever their ethnicity, color, sex, age, religion, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, or physical and mental ability are valued and respected. Our commitment is for all Byndies to have the freedom to be their true authentic selves.



Just as we are never finished innovating, Bynder's commitment to being An Even Better Bynder is a constant, evolving commitment that includes education, listening, and action.

title: Onderzoeker milieu economische statistieken
description:
* Den Haag
* HBO / WO
* Uitzicht op vast dienstverband, beginnend met een jaarcontract
* 3.404 tot 6.110 per maand

Zoek je een afwisselende baan op het snijvlak van milieu, duurzaamheid en economie?  

Doe je graag onderzoek en heb je plezier in het bouwen van nieuwe tools?  

  

Draag bij aan het maatschappelijke debat van Nederland en solliciteer snel.


  
jouw uitdaging


* Je werkt mee aan verschillende projecten op het terrein van milieueconomie en duurzaamheid. Je verzamelt, analyseert en verwerkt databronnen, maakt de data consistent en publiceert de uitkomsten op toegankelijke wijze op StatLine of via artikelen. Dit doe je in nauwe samenwerking met je collega’s in kleinere of grotere projectteams.
* Samen met collega’s werk je aan het beheer en de verdere ontwikkeling van bestaande dataverwerkings- en analyseprocessen.
* Je bent verantwoordelijk voor het opstellen van proces- en systeemdocumentatie en onderhoudt deze.Hierdoor wordt een goede gebruikersondersteuning gewaarborgd.
Dit is je team


Gezelligheid


Het is natuurlijk niet alleen maar hard werken. We praten, brainstormen en lachen heel wat met elkaar af.
Ons team


De jongste is 25 jaar, de oudste is 61 en we wonen overal: van Abcoude tot Amersfoort.
Publicaties


We publiceerden in 2023 meer dan 20 nieuwsberichten, die vaak de media haalden.
Samenwerken


We werken samen met andere CBS-teams én ministeries, planbureaus en internationale organisaties (EU, OECD en VN).
We verwelkomen je binnen de sector Nationale Rekeningen bij het team Arbeid, Milieurekeningen en Regio, dat bestaat uit ruim 35 mensen. We zijn gedreven onderzoekers en continu op zoek naar verbeteringen.
  

Het team is o.a. verantwoordelijk voor het samenstellen en verder ontwikkelen van de milieurekeningen, natuurlijk kapitaalrekeningen, monitoring van circulaire economie en de monitor brede welvaart.
  

Milieurekeningen onderzoeken de samenhang tussen belangrijke economische indicatoren en milieu-indicatoren. Zo kunnen de effecten van (milieu)economisch beleid worden geanalyseerd en maatschappelijk relevante vragen worden beantwoord. Een groot deel van de werkzaamheden binnen het team bestaat dan ook uit projecten die in opdracht van Eurostat, ministeries, planbureaus of andere externe opdrachtgevers worden uitgevoerd.
Dit ben jij


Je werkt graag en effectief samen met collega’s binnen en buiten het team.  

Verder heb je:


* een hbo of wo werk- en denkniveau;
* kennis van macro-economische ontwikkelingen en/of milieu- en duurzaamheidsvraagstukken;
* sterke technische en analytische vaardigheden en aantoonbare kennis en ervaring met R en SQL.


Heb je ook ervaring met ArcGIS? Dat vinden wij een pluspunt.


Dit kun je van ons verwachten


Voor onze arbeidsvoorwaarden volgen wij de CAO Rijk.  

Dat betekent dat je onder andere kunt rekenen op het volgende:


* Een salaris van minimaal EUR 3404,- en maximaal EUR 6110,- bruto per maand op basis van 36 uur. Afhankelijk van je kennis en ervaring.
* 8% vakantiegeld en een 13e maand. In totaal is dit 16,5% bovenop je salaris. Dit noemen wij het Individueel Keuze Budget (IKB). Je bepaalt zelf hoe, wanneer en op welke manier je dit budget wilt inzetten.
* Pensioenopbouw bij het ABP Pensioenfonds.
* Een laptop (Microsoft of Apple) en mobiele telefoon (Android of iOS).
* Twee tot drie dagen thuiswerken, de rest ben je aanwezig in ons onlangs gerenoveerde gebouw. In je team maak je daar verder afspraken over.
5222 datatabellen beschikbaar in 2022


Statline is de databank van het CBS en biedt een schat aan cijfers over de Nederlandse economie en samenleving.


+4,3%


Ten opzichte van 2021
70.000 (bijen)collega’s


Ruim 2100 CBS-collega’s maken samen onze statistiek, en 70.000 vlijtige bijen in de CBS-tuinen maken ook nog eens heerlijke honing.


+42%


In de zomermaanden
Gebruikers cbs.nl


Wist je dat er in 2022 maar liefst 6,9 miljoen gebruikers onze website cbs.nl bezochten?


* 1%


Ten opzichte van 2021
Nieuwe collega’s


Wist je dat we vorig jaar 363 vacatures hebben ingevuld? Word jij dit jaar onze nieuwe collega?


+15%


Ten opzichte van 2022
Wij houden ons aan de feiten


600 statistische onderzoeken per jaar, 70 duizend vermeldingen in de media en 14 miljard cijfers in StatLine.


+6%


Groei per jaar
Iets voor jou?


Reageer dan snel, want we sluiten de vacature zodra we iemand hebben gevonden.  

  

We voeren 2 gesprekken en sluiten het sollicitatieproces af met een arbeidsvoorwaardengesprek.  


Stel je vragen aan Hilda


h.folkerts@cbs.nl
06 11 499 166
**Voor de recruitmentbureaus: mocht je ons willen bellen voor een mogelijke samenwerking: wij stellen de interesse op prijs, maar vullen al onze (tijdelijke) vacatures zelf in.**

title: Senior Data Engineer
company_description: Adem jij data? Wij wel! Al meer dan 14 jaar zijn wij dag in, dag uit bezig met data. We hebben al vaak onze liefde voor data gedeeld met professionals. En deze liefde willen wij ook delen met jou!

title: AI Solutions Developer
description:
**Wil jij deel uitmaken en bijdragen aan het succesverhaal van LAB21?** 

**De klant is geen koning, de klant is onze familie!**

**Wie zoeken wij?**

Voor ons hoofdkantoor in Amersfoort zoeken wij per direct een AI Solutions Developer.

In deze rol ben je verantwoordelijk voor het verkennen en implementeren van de mogelijkheden van generative AI, zoals ChatGPT, om de bedrijfsprocessen van Lab21 verder te automatiseren.

Je hebt een relevante WO-opleiding afgerond of bijna afgerond, zoals Informatica of Data Science, en beschikt over aantoonbare kennis en interesse op het gebied van AI, machine learning en data-analyse. Daarnaast heb je sterke analytische vaardigheden en ben je in staat om complexe technische problemen op te lossen. Ervaring met programmeertalen zoals Python, R of Java is een vereiste, evenals kennis van cloud computing en ervaring met platforms zoals AWS, Azure of Google Cloud.

Goede communicatieve vaardigheden en het vermogen om effectief samen te werken in een team zijn van essentieel belang. Je bent proactief, leergierig en kunt goed omgaan met veranderingen en uitdagingen. Daarnaast heb je een sterke drive om jezelf verder te ontwikkelen op het gebied van AI en ICT-management.

**Wat ga je doen?**

Deze functie is nieuw binnen Lab21, wat betekent dat je een grote invloed hebt op de invulling ervan. Je zult een onderzoek uitvoeren naar de mogelijkheden van ChatGPT om de bedrijfsprocessen van Lab21 verder te automatiseren. Als Junior ICT Manager speel je een belangrijke rol bij het implementeren en beheren van AI-oplossingen binnen ons bedrijf. Je werkt nauw samen met verschillende teams om de behoeften van de organisatie in kaart te brengen en technologische oplossingen aan te dragen. Je analyseert en optimaliseert bestaande systemen en processen en identificeert kansen om AI-technologieën toe te passen.

**Plaats in de organisatie:**

Je zult rechtstreeks rapporteren aan de directie en een strategische rol vervullen bij het bespreken van automatiseringsvraagstukken en de mogelijkheden die verdere automatisering biedt om de marktpositie van Lab21 te versterken, zowel op het gebied van processen, commercie en marketing.

Als deze uitdagende rol je aanspreekt en je voldoet aan de gestelde eisen, nodigen we je van harte uit om te solliciteren.

**What is more:**

In deze positie ontvang je niet alleen een regulier salaris, maar ook een landmarkbonus voor elk succesvol afgerond project.

**Wat is LAB21?**

Lab21 is de snelst groeiende omnichannel speler in de Nederlandse woninginrichtingsmarkt, met 15 winkels. Ons streven is om onze klanten een combinatie van vakspecialistische service en betaalbare prijzen te bieden. Als moderne retailorganisatie leggen we sterk de nadruk op het bieden van online ondersteuning voor onze fysieke winkels.

Met een breed en commercieel productportfolio, waarvan een deel in eigen beheer wordt geproduceerd en aangevuld wordt met producten van gerenommeerde merken, streven we ernaar om onze klanten een optimale productmix te bieden.

Onze efficiënte organisatiestructuur komt voort uit een strikte scheiding van functionaliteit tussen het hoofdkantoor en de winkels. Het hoofdkantoor richt zich met een hoog niveau van automatisering op alle backofficeprocessen, terwijl de winkels zich volledig bezighouden met commerciële activiteiten, ondersteund door een sterke centrale marketingafdeling. Onze verkopers zijn daardoor volledig gericht op de klant en worden volledig ontlast van logistiek, aftersales, service en coördinerende taken. Deze lean en mean aanpak maakt onze organisatie zeer schaalbaar en resulteert in lage overheadkosten, wat onze klanten in staat stelt om te profiteren van zeer scherpe prijzen en tarieven.

Lab21 maakt altijd gebruik van directe grootschalige inkoop bij de bron. Hierdoor verkorten we de waardeketen en vereenvoudigen we het proces, wat resulteert in interessantere prijzen voor onze klanten. In tegenstelling tot bouwmarkten zijn wij gespecialiseerd in de productgroepen die wij verhandelen. Onze inkoper, tevens directeur, beschikt over een hoog niveau van expertise op het gebied van supply chain, wat verder reikt dan dat van een jonge inkoper bij een internationale bouwmarktketen. Deze toewijding en kennis stellen ons in staat om de beste producten te selecteren en aan te bieden aan onze klanten.

Met bewuste keuzes voor B- of C-locaties houden we onze huurkosten laag, zodat onze klanten niet betalen voor onnodig hoge kosten. Bij Lab21 zeggen we: "De klant is geen koning, de klant is onze familie." We streven er altijd naar om de meest geschikte vloer te kiezen voor de klant, in plaats van simpelweg de duurste optie te verkopen.

Als innovatief bedrijf omarmt Lab21 de kracht van generative AI en data science om onze bedrijfsprocessen te optimaliseren en onze klanten een nog betere ervaring te bieden.

Wij geloven sterk dat goede dienstverlening gebaseerd is op betrouwbare informatie. Daarom investeren we aanzienlijk in ICT-systemen om onze service en communicatie met klanten te optimaliseren. Elke order wordt behandeld als een individueel project, met als doel de klant volledig te ontzorgen. Bij een verbouwing en/of verhuizing ervaart de klant al genoeg stress. Daarom zorgen wij ervoor dat de vloer en alle voorbereidende werkzaamheden goed worden gepland en "just-in-time" uitgevoerd. Dit vereist uitstekend projectmanagement en coördinatie, vooral omdat er vaak externe partijen zoals leveranciers en transporteurs bij betrokken zijn. Daarom blijven we investeren in continue procesoptimalisatie.

Bij Lab21 is een tevreden klant onze grootste voldoening, elke dag opnieuw.

**Onze ambitie**

Lab21 is ambitieus. We zien dat onze formule succesvol is en het aantal klanten jaar na jaar sterk groeit. We streven ernaar om de beste te zijn en te blijven in onze markt.

We geloven sterk in de schaalbaarheid en globaliteit van onze formule. Daarom willen we onze activiteiten uitbreiden buiten Nederlandse grenzen. We zijn vastbesloten om onze positie te versterken en te groeien. We zijn ervan overtuigd dat onze aanpak en productaanbod aantrekkelijk zijn voor klanten in diverse Europese markten en andere continenten.

**Interesse?**

Stuur ons dan je CV met motivatie.

Een test kan onderdeel uitmaken van het sollicitatieproces.

Soort dienstverband: Fulltime, Uitzicht op vast, Freelance / zzp

Rooster:

* ma-vr

Secundaire arbeidsvoorwaarden:

* Kerstpakket
* Personeelskorting
* Reiskostenvergoeding

Soorten aanvullende vergoedingen:

* Vakantiegeld

Opleiding:

* HBO (Gewenst)

Ervaring:

* Developer: 1 jaar (Gewenst)

Werklocatie: Fysiek
